DOC.detailed_description: The study compare effectiveness cost-effectiveness two dominant heroin dependence treatment approach : center-based compulsory rehabilitation ( CCT ) community-based voluntary methadone treatment ( MMT ) Hai Phong City , Vietnam . CCT center institution people use drug confine two year . MMT internationally recognize efficacious treatment heroin dependence introduce Vietnam 2008 . The design combine retrospective prospective , non-randomized cohort three year ( data five time-points ) . The study conduct 2012 2014 , involve 208 CCT participant ( 80 % follow ) 384 MMT participant ( 78 % follow ) heroin dependence . The five time-points : baseline , two year treatment commencement , three month , six month 12 month initial two year . The study combine primary data secondary data assess effectiveness two treatment modality . The economic component measure cost two treatment modality compare cost-effectiveness outcome . The study two primary outcome : self-reported heroin abstinence ( confirmed urine drug screen ) self-reported drug-free day ( DFDs ) . DFDs report two different time-frames . DFDs precede 30 day use effectiveness comparison DFDs three year use cost-effectiveness comparison . The study four secondary outcome : illegal behavior , overdose , blood-borne virus ( BBV ) risk behavior , monthly drug spending ) . Mixed effect regression model use analyze effectiveness data non-parametric bootstrapping method use estimate cost-effectiveness . The time-frame cost-effectiveness analysis three year .
